DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study develop MS patient-matched healthy population norm Multiple Sclerosis Cognition Assessment Battery ( MS-COG ) representative United States ( US ) , France , Italy .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Establish Patient-Matched Population Norms Multiple Sclerosis Cognition Assessment Battery
DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion Criteria 1 . Ability understand purpose risk study provide sign date informed consent authorization use confidential health information accordance national local subject privacy regulation . 2 . Must good health determine Investigator , base medical history , physical examination , Screening evaluation . 3 . Must native language speaker country study conduct . Key 1 . Neurological illnesses/conditions , motor vocal tic ( include diagnosis Tourette 's syndrome ) , head trauma significant loss consciousness ( > 30 min ) , cerebral ischemia , carotid artery disease , epilepsy , brain tumor , dementia ( include mild cognitive impairment Alzheimer 's disease ) , chronic meningitis , multiple sclerosis , pernicious anemia , normalpressure hydrocephalus , HIV infection , Parkinson 's disease , Huntington 's disease . 2 . Medical illnesses/conditions may affect brain function , untreated hypertension ( blood pressure > 140/100 mm Hg ) , cardiac disease , insulindependent diabetes mellitus , endocrine disorder , renal disease , glaucoma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . 3 . Major psychiatric disturbance accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 5th edition ( US ) Axis I criteria [ American Psychiatric Association 2013 ] International Statistical Classification Diseases Related Health Problems , 10th revision Axis I criteria ( Europe ) [ WHO 2010 ] . 4 . History developmental disorder . Note : Other protocol define Inclusion/ Exclusion criterion may apply .
